name: John Bird
description:
PLS PLAY IT FULLSCREEN

Plot:

Flappy bird wanted me to make an action game for her. So i made one. In this game you play as angry flappy bird, fight jon wicks and build. And hunt the next-lvel-soda-pop which takes you to the next level.

Controls:

WASD- move and flap

left click - shoot

1234 - switch inventory slots

E - equip

right click - place or remove blocks
